function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased need for non-contact service activities in the 5-min community life circle","Impact":"Pressure on community service facilities and potential for overcrowding","Mitigation":"Developing efficient queuing systems and optimizing facility layouts","Technologies":"Smart queuing systems, space optimization software","People":"Residents, community administrators","Owner":"Community administrators"},{"Description":"Varying impact of non-contact interaction activities on community facilities post-COVID-19","Impact":"Challenges in spatial configuration and facility planning","Mitigation":"Flexible facility design and adaptive infrastructure","Technologies":"Modular building systems, adaptable space layouts","People":"Urban planners, architects, community administrators","Owner":"Urban planners, community administrators"},{"Description":"Scale effect of urgency in using community service facilities during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased pressure on facilities, potential for resource constraints","Mitigation":"Resource allocation optimization and capacity management","Technologies":"Facility management software, occupancy tracking systems","People":"Facility managers, community administrators","Owner":"Facility managers, community administrators"}]}
